title: rAsa maNDalam samadhigata nava vraja
sahitya:
P:  rAsa maNDalam samadhigata nava vraja lalanA 
samAgama vidhita nanda sukumAra krSNa samadhigata
			(madhyamakAla)
tAmara kumata daLAvaLi nIlada mAla suvarNa mahOnnata 
nituvana kancuka pravAra jaTI mayUraka karNikAra kuNDala
kara kankaNa karavalaya kAnci mEkhalAbharaNa ghaNa ghaNa
kiNi kiNi kuNi kuNi khala khala kastUri sindUra kAshmIra 
shrIkaNTha kanakAmbara kanakAmbarA-Dambara-viTambana
takiTa taku tarikiTaku DikuNa Dhinkuku tatAnku takirtaNu 
krSnapadam tinatilAna taLAngu tiranA tana tinutAri riti gOpi padam vara
